examples: Only adults are allowed in the casino.
She's an adult now, so she can make her own decisions.
Apenas adultos são permitidos no cassino.
Ela é adulta agora, então pode tomar suas próprias decisões.

suggested: Why did the adult go to bed early? Because they wanted to have a dream of being a kid again!
Being an adult means having to make tough decisions and dealing with tough situations.
Some people act like adults but have the emotional maturity of a child.
Did you know that the human brain doesn't fully mature until around the age of 25? That's why some people say they still feel like a kid even when they're technically an adult.
The smell of coffee in the morning is one of the many perks of being an adult.
The feeling of being responsible and in control of your life as an adult.
As an adult, you have the opportunity to connect with people from all walks of life and make meaningful relationships.
